insert.selectKey: select count(*) as count from app_id where id = #{appId.id}
insert.if: insert into app_id ( app_name, app_desc, created_by, created_time, last_updated_by, last_updated_time ) values( #{appId.appName}, #{appId.appDesc}, #{appId.createdBy}, #{appId.createdTime}, #{appId.lastUpdatedBy}, #{appId.lastUpdatedTime} )
